mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM duty a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND (a.company = '1' or a.company = '2' or a.company = '3' or a.company = '4')
AND (a.company = '5' or a.company = '6')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
